locations.name: The White House
locations.description: A little bleak, but warm inside. Promise.

locations.name: Country Mansion
locations.description: We have a lot of bathrooms. Don't go in the west wing.

locations.name: Pet-friendly Humble Abode
locations.description: Bring everyone and the dog. House-trained only please.

locations.name: Beach House
locations.description: Great for pool parties - if you don't mind the nippy Cornwall winters.

locations.name: The Cabin
locations.description: Get away from it all. No really, from everything. We have no internet.

locations.name: Lakeview Hut
locations.description: It might look a little ramshackled, but really lovely. The grass only grows inside the hut a little bit.
